channel.title: Need help connecting my server to hamachi
channel.description:
So recently me and my friends just wana chill in a little server. So I just downloaded a client and source and changed mostly everything to look like it's mine :p. I just want a couple of my friends on, so I don't think semi leeching is too bad. Anyways, I changed the old ips to my hamachi ip on just about everything. Obviously I missed something though. It works in localhost (127.0.0.1), but when I change the localhost ip to my hamachi ip, it just won't let me login because the client won't interact with the source. Even though I believe I changed everything in the client to my hamachi ip too. If someone could please help me make this work via teamviewer, I'd really appreciate it. I'll pm my teamviewer user and pass. Also, I am a semi good coder, so I will be able to move on after this works.
Thanks all!
